A

access() - Method in class Factories.ViewHandler
If the scene(access) is null, the method will find the FXML file by the given root using the method getRootByPath(), an object hierarchy from an XML document will be loaded(FXML controller) and the init method will be called on that object.
AccessModel - Interface in Model
 
AccessModelImpl - Class in Model
This model implementation is responsible for the logic for logging in the system as an admin.
AccessModelImpl() - Constructor for class Model.AccessModelImpl
Basic constructor initializing the Serializator class and the admin object
Accessories - Class in Objects
This class is representing any accessory type item that can be found in the shop.
Accessories(String, int, double, String, String) - Constructor for class Objects.Accessories
Basic constructor with id
Accessories(String, double, String, String) - Constructor for class Objects.Accessories
Basic constructor without id.
accessoryRadioOn(ActionEvent) - Method in class UserInterface.OrdersViewController
Sets a typeF textField invisible
AccessViewController - Class in UserInterface
Controller class for the Access FXML file.

View Model class for binding the controller class.
AccessViewModel(AccessModel) - Constructor for class UserInterface.AccessViewModel

add(String, int) - Method in class Objects.Log
Appends the log containing information about the action to either the admin log txt file or customer log txt file.
addDemand(String, int, String, String, DateTime, int) - Method in interface Model.MainCustomerModel
 
addDemand(String, int, String, String, DateTime, int) - Method in class Model.MainCustomerModelImpl
This adds a new demand to the Customer's demand list and updates the log file too.
addDemand(Demand) - Method in class Objects.Admin
This method adds a deleted demand to the Admin's deleted demand txt file.
addDemand(Demand) - Method in class Objects.Customer
This method is responsible for adding the chosen demand to the demand list for the admin.
addDemand(Demand) - Method in class Objects.User
 
addListener(String, PropertyChangeListener) - Method in class Model.StorageModelImpl
 
addListener(String, PropertyChangeListener) - Method in interface Objects.Subject
 
addOrder(String, String, int, double, String, String, int) - Method in interface Model.StorageModel
 
addOrder(String, String, int, double, String, String, int) - Method in class Model.StorageModelImpl
This method adds a new order to the order list and bin file depending on the radio button selected in the GUI.
addOrder(ActionEvent) - Method in class UserInterface.OrdersViewController
Decides the type of order being added to the order list depending on the radio button selected, then calls the addOrderProduct method on the view model with the int parameter corresponding to the specific radio button
addOrderProduct(int) - Method in class UserInterface.OrdersViewModel
Adds a new ordered product to the table.
addOrderProductToStorage(OrderProduct) - Method in interface Model.StorageModel
 
addOrderProductToStorage(OrderProduct) - Method in class Model.StorageModelImpl
This method adds ordered products from the Storage to the store.
addProduct(String, double, String, int, String) - Method in interface Model.StorageModel
 
addProduct(String, double, String, int, String) - Method in class Model.StorageModelImpl
This method creates a specific Gaming Merchandise through the use of the product factory.
addProduct(ActionEvent) - Method in class UserInterface.StorageViewController
Checks which of the radio buttons is selected and depending on that calls the addProduct method with the parameter representing the selected radio button.
addProduct(int) - Method in class UserInterface.StorageViewModel
This method is responsible for adding a product to the Storage by calling the addProduct method on the view model having the specific information about the product as the parameter.
addProductToStore(GamingMerchandise) - Method in interface Model.StorageModel
 
addProductToStore(GamingMerchandise) - Method in class Model.StorageModelImpl
This method adds a newly created product to the store
addToStorage(ActionEvent) - Method in class UserInterface.OrdersViewController
If there is a order selected from the table, calls the addToStorage method on the view model, if there is no order selected it shows an error message in the GUI.
addToStorage(OrderProduct) - Method in class UserInterface.OrdersViewModel
Adds the chosen product to the storage by calling the addOrderProductToStorage method on the view model.
addToStore(ActionEvent) - Method in class UserInterface.StorageViewController
Checks the chosen product from the table and calls the addToStore method on the view model with the chosen product as parameter.
addToStore(GamingMerchandise) - Method in class UserInterface.StorageViewModel
